monster.lemurian.name: Wemuwian
monster.lemurian.story:
De fiwst sentient species I discovewed on my unfowtunate awivaw. Awound 7' taw, with scawy skin not diffewent fwom that of a wizawd. Bipedaw. Aggwessive on sight, minus a few exceptions. These Wemuwians have an extwemewy powewfuw bite, but don't seem to empwoy weapons.

Aw species that I have encountewed have awmow on theiw shouwdews and wwists, indicating a high intewigence. Dey seem to wive in undewgwound tunnews netwowked aw ovew de pwanet, and can use these tunnews to ambush pwey.

Fwom what I've bwiefwy seen, dey seem to enjoy song and dance.
monster.rockGolem.name: Wock Gowem

Now DEY awe intewesting. These Gowems, which towew ovew me at 10' taw, awe constwucted fwom de soiw and wock beneath my feet. Aftew a bwiwiant wed fwash, de eawth itsewf moves to cweate these constwucts in 2 seconds fwat. If I didn't know bettew, I wouwd considew this.. magic.

Because of theiw matewiaw, dey awe extwemewy tough to take down. Using de same technowogy that constwucts them, de Wock Gowems awe capabwe of cweating a 'cwap' which genewates gweat amounts of enewgy. Damaging a gowem eventuawy causes it to mawfunction and die, wetuwning to de gwound.

Despite theiw powewfuw combat abiwities, de gowems awe gentwe to evewybody but me, and can be seen 'pwaying' with wiwdwife.
monster.wisp.name: Wisp
monster.wisp.story:
Chawactewized by theiw constant fwame, de Wisps awe not wiving beings. Each Wisp has a mask in its centew, whewe aw de fiwe ewupts fwom. De Wisps awe abwe to concentwate theiw heat into a wong wange heat bwast, capabwe of scowching anything in its path. On taking heavy damage, de fuew powewing de Wisp detonates, sending de mask soawing cweaw thwough de aiw.

How dey function ish a mystewy to me. Whiwe I've seen 'deactivated' masks aw awound this wowd, de onwy time I've spotted Wisps ish awound me, as if someone cweates them specificawy to kiw me..
monster.greaterWisp.name: Gweatew Wisp
monster.greaterWisp.story:
Oh wowd. These.. Gweatew Wisps, as I have gwown to caw them, awe absowutewy tewifying to face. Toughew then de Wock Gowem, fastew then de Wemuwian, and hawdew hitting then both combined. Unwike de wessew Wisps, de Gweatew Wisp has two awms capabwe of typicaw motion. Dey buwn a bwiwiant gween which piewces stwaight though my sun visow.

Theiw combat abiwities awe unpwecedented; I can be cweaw 200m away, and dey stiw manage to hit me squawe in de chest. I must stay hidden.. befowe dey find me again.
monster.sandCrab.name: Sand Cwab
monster.sandCrab.story:
A few houws aftew my cwash, I finawy decided to investigate de neawby awea. As I moved past a pawticuwawy wawge mound of sand, it began to shift and woaw. Fwom it ewupted a giant cwab-wike beast, standing above me at 10' with cwaws de size of a smaw man. De giant cwab moves suwpwisingwy fast fow its size; de fowiage gwowing on its back indicates that dey stay stiw fow wong pewiods of time. This cwab ish eithew extwemewy patient ow hibewnates weguwawy.

Aftew exhausting my suppwies in taking it down, I sawvaged what meat I couwd. Vewy chewy, but not unpweasant. Wooking acwoss de beach, I spot many simiwaw mounds of sand. I must keep moving; daywight ish coming.
monster.jellyfish.name: Jewyfish
monster.jellyfish.story:
An aiwbowne cweatuwe, capabwe of fwight using a combination of gases in its cweaw huw. Wike de Jewyfish on eawth, dey awso use puwsation to aid in wocomotion; howevew, wathew than a sewies of tentacwes, dey have two 'bwanches' made of many tentacwes wwapped awound themsewves.

Awso wike de Jewyfish, dey have quite de sting, capabwe of penetwating my weathew shiewding. De same gases used fow fwight awe used to cweate a vewy powewfuw ewectwostatic chawge.

When dey awe not busy hunting me, de Jewyfish have been seen sunbathing and absowbing de stwange fumes fwom de gwound.
monster.child.name: Chiwd
monster.child.story:
These smaw beings fiw me with dwead.. Fwom a distance I can see them fwowicking among de wocks- pwaying with de othew ghostwy 'chiwdwen'. I don't know how ewse to descwibe them, dey seem so innocent untiw I appwoach. 

Once I am spotted it as if some wicked switch ish fwipped and I am theiw pwaything. Whiwe I can defeat de smaw gwoups, I feaw I am onwy seawing my doom once theiw smaw, destwoyed bodies awe found.
monster.spitter.name: Spittew
monster.spitter.story:
Awas, anothew hostiwe cweatuwe. This one's natuwe cewtainwy betways its pwecocious appeawance. It even seems to be vexed by my wetawiation. What a petuwant fewow. 

His snapping maw huws owange biwe. De acidic mucus must be detonated by de gnashing teeth- conceivabwy simiwaw to ouw picwic acid. Fascinating, how couwd this have awisen? 

Post-mowtem I was awso abwe to discovew de souwce of de cweatuwe's impwessive fwexibiwity. Aside fwom de skuw, mandibwe, and teeth, de skeweton ish highwy cawtiwaginous!
monster.tinyImp.name: Tiny Imp
monster.tinyImp.story:
I seem to have found de one cweatuwe on this pwanet that DOESN'T want to kiw me. These smaw, weathewy cweatuwes awe spawned fwom vases I sometimes spot in de wuins. Dey seem to stay in packs, and fwequentwy cawy usefuw tweasuwe.

Immediatewy aftew spawning, these tiny imps wun in aw diwections. Whiwe I do feew a bit.. awfuw.. about kiwing what seems to be de equivawent of chiwdwen, I need de tweasuwe dey howd if I'm to suwvive. I'm sowy.
monster.blackImp.name: Bwack Imp
monster.blackImp.story:
Oh. Feaw. De Imp causes me feaw, with its wazow shawp tawons and its one eye, wocked into mine thwough my hewmet. De Imp uses a pwopewant to hovew above de gwound, giving it supewiow mobiwity ovew evewything.. incwuding me. 

Unwike de othew fauna on this pwanet, de bwack imp ish aggwessive to aw othew species. Ish de imp awso stwanded hewe?

De Bwack Imp can move fwom wocation to wocation, seemingwy instantwy. I wefuse to bewieve that de Imp has tewepowtation; that ish fow faiwy tawes and quantum physicists. I won't accept that it can achieve something biowogicawy that de human wace couwdn't achieve in its entiwe histowy.
monster.mushrum.name: Mushwum
monster.mushrum.story:
I have awived in an even stwangew wand. Aftew wecovewing fwom my sudden.. tewepowtation, I noticed that my suit was fwashing wawnings about aiw fiwtwation. Aw acwoss de wandscape wewe giant fungi, some as taw as twees.

When appwoaching a wawge buwbous mushwoom, it suddenwy spwouted out de gwound, jumping a few feet in de aiw then wanding on two nubby feet. At this point my aiw fiwtwation wawning went fwom yewow to wed, and I began to have difficuwties bweathing..

Whiwe sentient, these mushwums wewe not vewy intewigent. It had what wooked wike thwee eyes, but it couwd not navigate vewy wew, impwying that those may be fake eyes to scawe pwedatows. It awso had no mouth to eat, but wouwd pwant itsewf ovew cowpses, swowwy absowbing nutwients thwough its woot-wike feet.
monster.whorl.name: Whow
monster.whorl.story:
Day 8. I was awoken by an abwupt cowision of something hawd against my suit. A vowey of sensows scweamed in my eaws as a haiwine fwactuwe awced acwoss my vision. 

De hawd shew of a monstwous “Whow” neawy compwomised my aiw wock. If I hadn't had a smaw tube of powymew seawant fwom de astwotwain I wouwd not be wecowding this now. 

These cawapaced owganisms pwopew themsewves with some fowm of gas-pwopuwsion. Despite theiw simiwaw appeawance to de nautiwi of owd, dey do not use a bewows-wike system fow wocomotion, but a steady stweaming of gas thwough theiw cuwing shew. I wondew if this heavy awmow pwevents them fwom attaining highew awtitudes, constwained to hovew among de wand cweatuwes.
monster.clayMan.name: Cway Man
monster.clayMan.story:
Quick with his swowd and quickew with his feet; de agiwity of these cway 'peopwe' ish unexpected with a fowm so woughwy shaped. 

When faced with one of de few cweatuwes hewe which I feew some humanity in, my awoneness cwoses in. Why do dey have cway pots on theiw heads? Couwd it be pwotection fwom this cwuew weawity, ow maybe just to hide de scaws fwom this bwutaw pwanet..
monster.bighornBison.name: Bighown Bison
monster.bighornBison.story:
De tewepowtew neawy waunched me into a steaming dung heap. I couwd not have anticipated such an enowmous beast being its souwce. Mowe impwessive than theiw wumbwing bewows ish de bighown's chawge. Theiw many tons of muscwe pwoduce a cwushing swam of hown and matted haiw. 

When dey awe not stampeding aftew me I have obsewved these monstews using theiw massive heads to bwudgeon wocks and fight amongst themsewves. How can dey expend so much enewgy on fwuitwess activity? Awe dey mewewy twying to keep fwom fweezing?
monster.mechanicalSpider.name: Mechanicaw Spidew
monster.mechanicalSpider.story:
De mawwawe of ouw age! These mechanicaw pawasites wewe pwobabwy wuwking on de ship befowe de cwash. Piwates wiw use these bugs to cowect especiawy vawuabwe cawgo, wediwect twansmission signaws, ow even hijack ships. Spidews can be pwogwammed with aw kinds of mawicious objectives. 

In genewaw dey awe quite difficuwt to find and ewadicate on wawge vessews, but now that dey'we woose dey seem to be abwe to opewate outside theiw softwawe. Dey have wetained theiw defense capabiwities, and awe wisky to engage. Though, I wondew, how wong wiw dey continue to wun without access to an ewectwicaw gwid?
monster.gup.name: Gup
monster.gup.story:
It ish quite wawe that I smew anything thwough my wespiwatow. I couwd not have been pwepawed fow how bizawe no wongew having a sense of smew ish.  Howevew, thewe have been a wawe few occasions when I caught some twace awoma- genewawy somewhat bittew on this pwanet, but I savow them gweediwy. 

When I encountewed this gewatinous beast I was assaiwed by a sweet smew! A stwangewy fwuity scent.. Oh, how it bwings me back to a mowe innocent time! As I stwuck de congeawed bwimp of a cweatuwe it divided and seemed to gain enewgy. With each bwow mowe of de sacchawine odow escaped de monstew. I must admit, I may have been ovewzeawous in my attack..
monster.parent.name: Pawent
monster.parent.story:
A deadwy fowce, dey wush at me mad with gwief and wage. Pawents wiw swam de gwound; theiw onwy aim to cwush de butchew of theiw offspwing. Theiw powewfuw bwows open gweat washes in de quaking gwound.

Though my guiwt awmost stays my hand, I cannot wet them keep me fwom suwviving this nightmawish pwanet. I know it ish impossibwe to quew theiw fuwy; so instead I must end it.
monster.evolvedLemurian.name: Evowved Wemuwian
monster.evolvedLemurian.story:
Couwd this be a distant cousin of de Wemuwians bewow? An ancient evowutionawy weap? These aiwbowne weptiwes do not intewact with de gwound Wemuwians except to hawass them occasionawy. Pewhaps thewe ish some kind of natuwaw feud between de species? 

It ish de membwanous skin that attaches theiw wong awms to theiw body which enabwes theiw fwight. Each wingtip cuwminates in vicious tawons. When dey come in fwocks these winged Wemuwians awe capabwe of gweat cawnage.
monster.templeGuard.name: Tempwe Guawd
monster.templeGuard.story:
A wobot cweatuwe that assembwes itsewf.. I have not seen them matewiawize othew than when I unknowingwy twiggew theiw pwesence. I cannot bewieve this ish indeed a machine- and yet it ish made fwom some awoy and uses heavy awtiwewy! Was this on de ship, ow awe these guawds a natuwawy occuwing 'species' hewe? My suit's scannews awe unabwe to detect any manufactuwews' signatuwe.

Dey seem to be detewmined not to wet me pass. Dey attack with unwimited focus.
monster.elderLemurian.name: Ewdew Wemuwian
monster.elderLemurian.story:
Seems to be vewy wawge vewsion of de Wemuwians; pewhaps this gweat wizawd ish a queen? With simiwaw awmow and much thickew skin, it took much mowe to bwing down this foe. She moves much swowew and posses a powewfuw scowching bwast.

I wouwd wiwingwy give up some of my dwindwing wations to expwowe de Wemuwian tunnews unnoticed. My mind envisions gweat communaw cavewns and many spectacuwaw subtewanean dwewings. Do gweat wegions of Wemuwians wawk undew my feet?
monster.archerBug.name: Awchew Bug
monster.archerBug.story:
Such aggwavating cweatuwes! These insects come in dwoves- as a gwoup theiw wings cweate a maddening whine. Even de othew cweatuwes seem distuwbed by theiw pwesence. Though dey awe not pawticuwawy stwong, de ciwcwing insects cewtainwy fwustwate me. 

A smaw amount of theiw pwojectiwe spit managed to penetwate one of de wayews of my suit. It was extwemewy caustic. A festewing wash has fowmed in de awea, but doesn't seem to be spweading.
monster.colossus.name: Cowossus
monster.colossus.story:
A wow gwoaning, wasting fow a few days at weast. Fwom de wewative safety of my dwop pod I watched as a mountain wose to its knees, pushing itsewf up with awms of stone and diwt and twine. 

De Cowossus appeaws as a cousin of de Wock Gowem and shawe many simiwawities, fwom its wed gaze to its stocky statuwe. Awound its feet many smawew gowems wose, joining it. In what possibwe ways couwd conventionaw weapons hewp me?

I've begun to find a dawk humow in de absowute ovewkiw that I face. This ish simpwy widicuwous.
monster.wanderingVagrant.name: Wandewing Vagwant
monster.wanderingVagrant.story:
Day 3. Whiwe wooking thwough some wweckage of de owd ship, I fewt a hot sensation on my skin and a bwiwiant white fwash. Ovew de howizon maybe 5 miwes nowth I saw it, wooming ovew de fowest tops.

It must be de size of a house, this thing. A massive vawiant of de jewyfish seen eawiew; this behemoth hovews in de aiw, seawching fow something. De gas used to pwopew this beast bend de twees bewow it fwat. When it spotted its pwey, it sent out six biowuminescent owbs, aw cwashing towawds de gwound and incinewating de tawget. 

This Vagwant, as I've come to caw it, seems to wandew amidst de skies, fowowed by many jewyfish. On de occasion de cwouds pawt, I sweaw I sometimes see hundweds of vagwants up thewe. What awe dey wooking fow?
monster.magmaWorm.name: Magma Wowm
monster.magmaWorm.story:
I've stumbwed upon an owd wewic, notabwy with two distinct stone pwongs. On appwoaching it it whiwed to wife, appawentwy chawging up. This seemed to distuwb something deep and viowent bewow de gwound..

De Magma Wowm expwoded out of de gwound, knocking me off my feet. Whiwe I stwuggwed with shew shock, I saw it awc thwough de sky, then pwunge back into de gwound with anothew bang. 

Weaching about.. 200 metews, de wowm moves extwemewy fast fow its size. Pewmanentwy buwning out of powes in its skin, de Magma Wowm uses this fwame as both a hunting toow and a way to mewt thwough de gwound quickwy. Its smaw, beady eyes wuwch awound, wooking fow pwey. With its massive size, de Magma Wowm must eithew eat VAST amounts of food a day ow hibewnate fow a vewy, vewy, vewy wong time bewow gwound.
monster.ancientWisp.name: Ancient Wisp
monster.ancientWisp.story:
Couwd this be de awchitect of de smawew wisps? Pewhaps this Ancient Wisp ish de puppeteew behind de fiewy masks hawassing me thus faw, ow ish he awso a deviwish device of something gweatew..?

De heat coming off de puwpwe fwames ish extweme. Fewocious cowumns of wightning thweaten to showt-out my suit, ow wowse, tuwn me into a bwistewed husk. What fuews these viowent, buwning appawitions?
monster.impOverlord.name: Imp Ovewowd
monster.impOverlord.story:
Oh, why me? My heawt stopped when this gweat Imp manifested in pweviouswy empty space. So many howendous eyes. With a gaping scweam de Imp wets out a deadwy wed vapow. Some type of wasew awso twaiws me. 

This demon ish just as baffwing in its movements as de smawew one. Bawewy escaping de Imp's whipping gwasp I wanded a finaw bwow. Its dying body spwit open at its mewidian, dispwaying its innawds wike some ghastwy fwowew. This monstew ish just as gwuesome in death as it was in wife.
monster.ifrit.name: Ifwit
monster.ifrit.story:
Couwd this be..? Tawes I nevew bewieved wecounted a howibwe beast, fiwe incawnate. Scouwge of anothew sowaw system, de Ifwit neawy wiped out an entiwe space cowony befowe being chained and waunched into de gweat bwack void. Supposedwy de fwaming jets that accompanied his woaws couwd be seen fow days as he dwifted outwawds. 

Gweat towews, what must have been de containment stwuctuwe used to twap this monstew, pwevent his escape even on this fowsaken pwane. De onwy expwanation I have fow my suwviving this wegendawy encountew ish his many yeaws dwifting in space and having been fettewed in this unfowgiving, fwozen wastewand.
monster.toxicBeast.name: Toxic Beast
monster.toxicBeast.story:
This gowiath's body has been cawved by this wowd, covewed in numewous scaws. De squeawing queen had seen many battwes. Hew coawse haiw gwowing in jagged patches between each owd wound onwy incweased hew feawsome appeawance. 

Hot bweath fwom de boaw's massive nose fogged up my hewmet so badwy that it was a mawvew I was abwe to evade hew stomping hooves ovewhead.
monster.cremator.name: Cwematow
monster.cremator.story:
I couwd not bewieve my eyes as this cweatuwe ewupted fwom de wava. My suit's tempewatuwe gauges scweeched in wawning. How can anything subsist in such heat? De wava pawts in waves as de monstew swims wapidwy thwough it. 

Thwough cwatews in de Cwematow's thick back awmow wed hot bouwdews expwode in evewy diwection. De amount of heat and pwessuwe within its body must be a souwce of immense powew. Howevew, its head does not appeaw as wew pwotected. I pway that it ish a souwce of weakness, fow if this weviathan bests me I know thewe wiw be no wemains weft to mawk my showt existence.
monster.scavenger.name: Scavengew
monster.scavenger.story:
Who knew a pack wat couwd be so dangewous! This cweatuwe seems to be hoawding many of de items wittewed acwoss this pwanet. I have seen no othews of its kind. If it hadn't been so intent on swaying me I wouwd have twied to gain this Scavengew as an awy.. 

Wiw I evew see a fwiendwy face again, ow wiw my wast bweaths be on this hostiwe pwanet?
monster.providence.name: Pwovidence
monster.providence.story:
I wecognized him fwom de secuwity footage... he was de one who bwew de cawgo hatches open. He was de one who kiwed evewyone. 

Pwovidence, as I came to caw him, moved fastew and with mowe puwpose than anything ewse I've seen on this pwanet. He must command gweat powew, fow he seemed to easiwy contwow two gweat giwded wuwms of a species simiwaw to de Magma Wowm. Ish he abwe to command evewyone on this pwanet? I don't know his puwpose, ow his weasoning, but he did not give me a choice. I had to kiw him... so why do I feew wike I made a tewibwe mistake?

...Why did we have a tewepowtew fwom this pwanet in ouw cawgo howd?
monster.bramble.name: Bwambwe
monster.bramble.story: Whiwe wawking thwough ovewgwown wuins I found mysewf suwounded by stwange wustwing that I couwd not pwace.  Stepping into a massive tempwe, vines whipped de entwyway shut and de ivy began swithewing down de waws.  These wiving Bwambwes spit caustic venom and I'm thankfuw to onwy have howes weft in my gwoves. Theiw hypnotic sway distiws feaw in me and I wecognize some highew intewigence in theiw movements.  De bawk at theiw base faciwitates some kind of wocomotion, though I can't identify any appawent muscuwaw system inside that wouwd dwive it. Aftew de encountew, de wesuwting coughs and spasms weft me on edge as I scawed de towew and weft de echoes behind me.
monster.lemurianCavalry.name: Wemuwian Cavawy
monster.lemurianCavalry.story: I found a gwoup of wed Wemuwians westing in de diwapidated wuins with domesticated boaws awongside them.  I've nevew seen a wed species outside of de fwying types, though I doubt these awe any mowe wewcoming.  With gweat speaws and fwamboyant hewmets, dey wesembwe cavawy of times past, and I'm not equipped to face any chawiots head-on. In de distance I can see two of them spawing atop theiw beasts. Dey attack with shawp agiwity and acwobatic pwowess that I hope to nevew expewience.
monster.macrobe.name: Macwobe
monster.macrobe.story: Sinking into an endwess wake, I was caught off-guawd by these huge cewuwaw beasts.  Bounding towawds me, I can awmost identify theiw intewnaw anatomy behind thick membwanes - How ish it possibwe that some sowt of micwobe couwd get this wawge?  Can this weawy be a singwe cew? Wough, thown-wike ciwia coat its suwface and it's fwagewum sewves as a wazow shawp whip. De watew doesn't seem to impede it at aw, though its stwange bouncing behaviow may be a wesuwt of its attempts to puwsue me undew heavy watew pwessuwe. I'm weawy of de fowce it seems to exewt even within these conditions. My oxygen suppwy can't affowd any weaks.
monster.macrobicPredator.name: Macwobic Pwedatow
monster.macrobicPredator.story: Some kind of massive insect, this cweatuwe snaps wike a vipew and skittews wike an ant.  It shouwdn't be possibwe at such a scawe to move so abwuptwy and yet it does.  Simiwaw to de Macwobe, this monstew ish some kind of pwedatowy cew. With a massive wope of newves at its cowe, I can onwy imagine it acts on instinct awone.  I dug into a cowpse to see if de spinaw wope couwd sustain me in this toxic hive, but I found my awms stuck to de thick membwane and I had to use my knife to wemove de non-newtonian gew. It'd make a gweat twap fow pwey, but I don't have time to test that theowy.
monster.lynxTribe.name: Wynx Twibe
monster.lynxTribe.story: I gwanced to one side, twying to get my beawings. By sheew wuck, my eyes picked up something bawewy visibwe, so stiw it couwd be mistaken fow a wock. A shivew wan down my spine as I weawized it was awive. I hadn't heawd anything appwoach; how wong had it been watching me? Why hadn't it attacked me? I suppose de cweatuwe had nevew seen anything wike me. As we exchanged gazes, I noticed thewe wewe mowe of them. Gwipped by feaw, I shot a gwance at my fiweawm which, in my hubwis, was stiw in its howstew. A twig snapped, and I immediatewy wooked back to them, but dey wewe gone. I wawk swowwy now. Thewe couwd be one of these behind evewy bwade of gwass.
monster.lynxTotem.name: Wynx Totem
monster.lynxTotem.story: Twavewing thwough de fungaw cavewns, I kept seeing out of pwace wubbwe that twaiwed to nowhewe.  With no buiwdings in sight, I was shocked to see a bwick waw in de distance.  Wittwe cat-wike cweatuwes with masks and weaponwy danced awound de stwuctuwe, and I couwd heaw them waugh with one anothew.  Dey appeawed to be pwacticing some kind of wowship, though de stwuctuwe wooked unwike anything I've seen on this pwanet.  Mowe of them cwawwed out fwom de diwt neawby, but stwangewy I haven't seen any evidence of them westing ow hiding in de soiw pwiow to that.  Wuckiwy dey wewe distwacted - I don't know that I couwd take on a howde of that size, no mattew how smaw dey wewe.
monster.swift.name: Swift
monster.swift.story: These fwying stones manage to stay aiwbowne despite theiw shawe awmow.  Wike a thousand dawts thwown fwom de sun, dey dive so swiftwy towawd me that theiw beaks swam into de gwound.  I've yet to see a suwface that dey cannot punctuwe, and I'm shocked that theiw beaks nevew seem wown. Theiw pwedictive aim ish twoubwing, and dey seem to know whewe I'm headed befowe I do. I've witnessed packs of these stwange biwds ciwcwing wike vuwtuwes in de distant sky, though I've nevew witnessed any of them scavenging fow food. Attempts to fashion theiw awmow into new bwades have wesuwted in nothing but chips in my knife.
monster.trokk.name: Twokk
monster.trokk.story: Whiwe westing in de shade of a massive twee, I was stawtwed at what I thought was an eawthquake.  De gwound shifted beneath my feet and I was suddenwy thwown into de aiw.  Beneath me was de gaping maw of a Twokk, and if I wewen't aweady gwipping my pistow it wouwd've cwushed me into sheet metaw.  Beyond de stone extewiow of this stwange wawking wog ish some kind of vuwnewabwe fwesh wike de inside of an awigatow's mouth.  With no space fow a stomach I shuddew at de thought of what happens to its victims.
monster.tuber.name: Tubew
monster.tuber.story: De Tubew ish weminiscent of de smaw pwants I cawed fow back on de ship.  Nestwing themsewves deep in de gwound, dey hide fwom pwey and wait fow vibwations to initiate theiw fanged attack.  Wike fighting a giant antwion, sometimes de best stwategy was to wuwe them out by tossing spent magazines. I twied stones and othew bait, but theiw wesponses to de bait seemed dependant on some unseen quawity.  De behaviow of de beasts on de pwanet continue to concewn me - I feew wike aw eyes awe on me despite how natuwaw these animaws seem fwom a distance.

stage.desolateForest.name: Desowate Fowest
stage.desolateForest.story: Cwashing into a vewdant fiewd isn't de wowst outcome. I can see wush, wowing hiws and stwange castwes buiwt into mountains. Thewe awe foweign species patwowing de gwasswands and bizawe housing foundations ewected awong wown footpaths. I've seen wizawds who wawk wike men and othewwowdwy stone cweatuwes infused by bwazing wights.  Dey seem dociwe and intewigent, passing by one anothew with wittwe intewaction, but theiw stiffened postuwes weave me wawy. Thewe's so much cuwtuwe hewe fow an undocumented pwanet. Thewe's so much histowy to these buiwdings, but theiw constwuction doesn't make any sense. Webaw and concwete make up juveniwe fabwications, accompanied by wown bwicks gathewed fwom ancient castwes just metews away.  Twee stumps and dead bwanches wittew de wandscape as if a fowest was fewed. But decay settwed on this gawden wong ago... How do you get to concwete befowe waising a singwe viwage? Wed spawks dance in de distant sky.  I don't know what I'm hoping fow.
stage.driedLake.name: Dwied Wake
stage.driedLake.story: A massive desewt fiwed with boawdwawks and ten-foot cwabs. I'm shocked that this ish anywhewe neaw de fowest I was just in, but I can stiw see those mountains in de distance - Aw that gweenewy twaded fow dust and skewetons. I wouwd think these catwawks wewe buiwt to pwotect fwom de hot sand bewow, but these wwecked ships awe buwied in such shawow dunes. When was thewe watew hewe? Wain hits my hewmet and sizzwes at my feet. De ovewcast sky softens de shadows of petwified bawnacwes cast ovew de distant wooden stwuctuwes. Dey'we hewd togethew wike owd junk in a gawage. I can feew de pwanks bow undew my weight, but I'd wathew take my chances than wade thwough a muddy sea of cwaws and mandibwes.
stage.dampCaverns.name: Damp Cavewns
stage.dampCaverns.story: I'm waunched into dawkness.  De biowuminescence ish fighting with de pitch bwack of de cavewns, and I can bawewy make out cwiffs and vaweys awongside these enowmous mushwooms. Some youngew ones toddwe awound and wewease dense gas cwouds, but I've yet to see any individuaws who have gwown beyond my height. I'm cautious to touch de stawks of any of these towewing masses shouwd I find one, so I'm weft cweeping thwough de dawk bewows towawds de next pwonged powtaw. De eawth's wotten constitution weaves de gwound piwowy. Distant sinkhowes above me dot de ceiwing wike staws. It'd be nice, if it wewen't fow de constant excwetions pouwing awound my boots. And de wotten stench. I can't even howd my nose.
stage.skyMeadow.name: Sky Meadow
stage.skyMeadow.story: I wondew how these wandmasses stay afwoat?  I can't feew any gwavitationaw abnowmawities hewe, even when I'm beneath them. So faw this pwanet has fewt wike wawking on Maws, nothing wouwd've indicated this as a possibiwity. Aftew fawing asweep on an isowated peninsuwa, I was shocked to wake up with company.  Stone statues of hooded figuwes had suwounded me siwentwy whiwe I swept. No dwag mawks, no footsteps, no sound. Except thewe was a sound - a faint hum wesonating between them. Aftew a few minutes of stiwness, I wose to my feet.  I weached out to push them aside and de humming stopped.
stage.ancientValley.name: Ancient Vawey
stage.ancientValley.story: This bwidge just goes on fowevew... but at weast it _is_ a bwidge. Between this bwizzawd and de mountain fog I can't see mowe than two metews ahead, even with my mounted wights.  I know I haven't accidentawy tuwned awound because de stampede keeps wumbwing in de distance behind me, though I'm stawting to wondew if its just de wind against de cwumbwing cwiffsides. Thewe's scowched steew stwewn awong de woad, stiw smoking. What kind of fiwe couwd buwn in a pwace wike this? I'w have to cwambew down to de exposed access tunnews wunning undewneath de bwidge to west, though I can't tew if de dwop bewow ish 10 metews ow 10 miwes.
stage.sunkenTombs.name: Sunken Tombs
stage.sunkenTombs.story: It's hawd to tew how deep these catacombs go. I don't have enough oxygen to expwowe mowe deepwy. Muwaws descwibing some kind of waw ow migwation awe etched into de waws, though de watew pwessuwe must've town them apawt yeaws ago. I can make out figuwes widing ships - it's hawd to tew and I imagine any species that wouwd buiwd a tomb this deep undewwatew wouwdn't wequiwe them. De sawcophagi wining de haws wing howow and de tabwes and pots wook untouched wike some sowt of nucweaw shewtew, fwozen in time. De ceiwings in hewe awe so high and have skywights dug out fwom de eawth above.  De caustics awe beautifuw on de owd stonewowk, though I don't see how dey intended fow de sun diaw bewow to sewve its puwpose.
stage.magmaBarracks.name: Magma Bawacks
stage.magmaBarracks.story: It's hot. My suit can't weguwate in tempewatuwes wike these. I can see watewfaws of wava fwowing fwom gwand battwements above me feeding into wakes of magma. De giant tuwtwes bewow seem quite fond of it, though de suwounding Wemuwians seem to have buiwt gweat steew pens to cage them in. I've caught gwimpses of de twibes fewying back and fowth atop theiw ashen shews awmost as fwequentwy as I've seen sacwifices made to feed them. These wawkways between de watch towews awe cawm fow now, but de amount of weapons stwewn about awe concewning. I can heaw de cwanking of wowkshops ahead. De onwy way weft ish up fwom hewe. A miwe ow so above me I can see de woots of a gweat twee with battwements spiwawing towawd it. Maybe I won't need to take a powtaw this time?
stage.hiveCluster.name: Hive Cwustew
stage.hiveCluster.story: It's hawd to tew whats awive and what isn't down hewe. De fibwous membwanes that wine de waws awe sticky wike fwesh sap, and its difficuwt to avoid stepping on gestating pustuwes whewevew you go. I'm stuck hanging fwom this fwesh-wope fow now. It's eithew waiting fow these owange beasts to weave ow upsetting de hive with mowe gunfiwe. At weast this time I'm smewing stwawbewies instead of wot, but de sweet siwen's caw isn't doing much when I can see skewetons inside this thing. I can feew a swight cwawwing sensation awound my hands and de heat  puwses fwom these fibews wike some kind of sick womb. I heawd what sounded wike cwying a moment ago, but it's stopped since then. It was pwobabwy my imagination, de constant buzzing ish as deafening as it ish fwightening.
stage.templeOfTheElders.name: Tempwe of de Ewdews
stage.templeOfTheElders.story: A vast howe of cwouds swiws awong de wip of this massive fwoating widge. Towews and chuwches awe constwucted with windows and awchways aw standing with wevewence towawd de centew of de miwes-wide gap. A sowt of vowtex sucks de aiw downwawd and I can see fwocks of biwds dancing in de wind, wike some sowt of wituaw. De sun touches these stones wike nowhewe ewse and a massive spiwe echoes into de sky, piewcing de cwouds onwy to be swawowed again befowe weaching de atmosphewe. It has to have been a thousand steps cwimbed by now, with de cowpses piwing up in de nave bewow. Thundew woaws down this spiwaw, with wed wightning fwashing shadows of futuwe combatants against de waws. Fwom this height I can finawy see it: De Contact Wight.

With hawf of Cwass-A ships out of commission due to [WEDACTED], de 'Contact Wight' has been chosen to dewivew [WEDACTED]'s pweviouswy scheduwed cawgo. stage.boarBeach.name: Boaw Beach
stage.boarBeach.story:
Thwough some bwambwes and fencing I've come acwoss a cweawing in de fog. A big bang dwopped me fwom my pewch as boaws wampaged, weaving in and out of de iwon webaw cowected fwom de endwess bwidge. De spikes wewe owganized into pattewns, awmost wike fawm pens, and de pigs each took tuwns cowecting diwt and piwing it between them. Beyond that was a bawen ciwcwe fowmed fwom wepeated stomping in de tundwa. Two boaws wewe fighting within, but one dwessed in a shiwt appeawed to be dancing between de othew's attacks, as if it had yeaws of expewience.  What <ul>ki d o  eco s  s      n? W     a  --</c>
